14cdc724af64942e93994f97e9eafc8272d15605.query:
INSERT INTO librepages_site_deploy_events
            (event_type, time, site, pub_id) VALUES (
                (SELECT iD from librepages_deploy_event_type WHERE name = $1),
                $2,
                (SELECT ID from librepages_sites WHERE hostname = $3),
                $4
            );

1be33ea4fe0e6079c88768ff912b824f4b025019.query: SELECT name, password  FROM librepages_users WHERE name = ($1)

279b5ae27935279b06d2799eef2da6a316324a05.query:
UPDATE librepages_users set name = $1
            WHERE name = $2

3705b8869aab99d749c08d9c9633931f0b742169.query: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 from librepages_sites WHERE hostname = $1)

39854fcbfb0247377c6c5ca70c2c0fa780454884.query:
SELECT
                    librepages_deploy_event_type.name,
                    librepages_site_deploy_events.time,
                    librepages_site_deploy_events.pub_id
                FROM
                    librepages_site_deploy_events
                INNER JOIN librepages_deploy_event_type ON
                    librepages_deploy_event_type.ID = librepages_site_deploy_events.event_type
                WHERE
                    librepages_site_deploy_events.site = (
                        SELECT ID FROM librepages_sites WHERE hostname = $1
                    )
                AND
                    librepages_site_deploy_events.pub_id = $2

53f3c21c06c8d1c218537dfa9183fd0604aaf282.query: SELECT name FROM librepages_users WHERE ID = $1

6a557f851d4f47383b864085093beb0954e79779.query:
UPDATE librepages_users set email = $1
            WHERE name = $2

77612c85be99e6de2e4a6e3105ebaeb470d6cc57.query:
SELECT
                time,
                pub_id
              FROM
                  librepages_site_deploy_events
              WHERE
                  site = (SELECT ID FROM librepages_sites WHERE hostname = $1)
              AND
                  event_type = (SELECT ID FROM librepages_deploy_event_type WHERE  name = $2)
              AND
                  time = (
                      SELECT MAX(time) 
                      FROM
                          librepages_site_deploy_events
                      WHERE
                          site = (SELECT ID FROM librepages_sites WHERE hostname = $1)
                      )

8735b654bc261571e6a5908d55a8217474c76bdf.query: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 from librepages_users WHERE email = $1)

924e756de5544cece865a10a7e136ecc6126e3a6.query:
UPDATE librepages_users set password = $1
            WHERE name = $2

aed3f57305201a19739dfb11cf8780036b992925.query:
SELECT site_secret, repo_url, branch, hostname, pub_id
            FROM librepages_sites
            WHERE owned_by = (SELECT ID FROM librepages_users WHERE name = $1 )
            AND hostname = $2;

b48c77db6e663d97df44bf9ec2ee92fd3e02f2dc.query: SELECT name, password  FROM librepages_users WHERE email = ($1)

bdd4d2a1b0b97ebf8ed61cfd120b40146fbf3ea9.query: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 from librepages_users WHERE name = $1)

ced69a08729ffb906e8971dbdce6a8d4197bc9bb.query: SELECT email FROM librepages_users WHERE name = $1

d132d22a214356474d450afc148ae913080119a9.query:
SELECT repo_url, branch, hostname, owned_by, pub_id
            FROM librepages_sites
            WHERE site_secret = $1

d2327c1bcb40e18518c2112413a19a9b26eb0f54.query:
SELECT
                    librepages_deploy_event_type.name,
                    librepages_site_deploy_events.time,
                    librepages_site_deploy_events.pub_id
                FROM
                    librepages_site_deploy_events
                INNER JOIN librepages_deploy_event_type ON
                    librepages_deploy_event_type.ID = librepages_site_deploy_events.event_type
                WHERE
                    librepages_site_deploy_events.site = (
                        SELECT ID FROM librepages_sites WHERE hostname = $1
                    );

e4adf1bc9175eeb9d61b495653bb452039cc3881.query: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 from librepages_deploy_event_type WHERE name = $1)

f4957eeddb139c82ef68cfc3ed2ddf52ff292fdf.query:
SELECT repo_url, branch, hostname, owned_by, site_secret
            FROM librepages_sites
            WHERE pub_id = $1
            AND
                owned_by = (SELECT ID from librepages_users WHERE name = $2)

f651da8f411b7977cb87dd8d4bd5d167661d7ef1.query:
INSERT INTO librepages_deploy_event_type
                    (name) VALUES ($1) ON CONFLICT (name) DO NOTHING;

faa4170a309f19a4abf1ca3f8dd3c0526945aa00.query:

            (name , password, email) VALUES ($1, $2, $3)
